titles.title: For the relief of Vladimir Epschtein and Cilia Epschtein.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on International Law, Immigration, and Refugees.

bill.summary: 4/1/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the granting of a visa and admission to the United States for permanent residence pursuant to the Immigration and Nationality Act to two named individuals.
